name: Rolling The Dice
description:
COOL DESCRIPTION HEADER The game was made for GMTK2022. Do you think the game is about casinos or randomness since it has such a name?  Nope. You have to roll the dice.  Literally.

That's very original.

VERY

P.S. Well, if you are reading this, means that you still not playing my game... Ok, maybe I should tell more about it.

,,,

It's a puzzle game! How about that, ha?

Still not? 

Bruh... 

Just download it, I'm not the world's best salesman, you should just try it, it's small and cool

A five-minute adventure, in and out.

Thanks for playing! And please leave a feedback!

Thanks to Kenney for assets

Music by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org
